## Description {#details}

A marker analysis to determine if extra passes should be run on demand.

Passes requesting extra transformations to run need to request and preserve this analysis.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/extrapassmanager-h">ExtraPassManager.h</a>.
